hackerCard.description: I sent a fake email from your bank asking for your account details.

playerCards.description: I checked the email address - the message didnâ€™t come from my bank.
I never give out personal information in response to an email.
I sent the details you asked for so you could check on my account.

explanation: Phishing is a fraudulent attempt to obtain sensitive information, such as usernames, passwords and financial details, by simulating reliable communication.
